title: Juniper Networks security advisory (AV26-128)
description: On February 12, 2026, Juniper Networks published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following product. Included were critical updates for the following:
products: Juniper Secure Analytics (JSA) 7.5.0   versions prior to 7.5.0 UP14 IF01
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
